name: Onanigan
description:
"Do not go, please, they never listen. Why do you think they will do different
this time?"

Arrows / WASD to Move,
Space to Jump,
you can triple jump.

Made during Ludum Dare 30.
- Gamepad compatible
- Right click to Fullscreen

If you are having trouble jumping when upside down, just walk to the corner
until you fall, then jump to the wall you want.
